contextName: Python - More Data Structures: Set, Dictionary
contextDescription: Advanced Python data structures focusing on sets and dictionaries, lambda functions, map/filter/reduce concepts, and understanding memory management
learningObjectives: Understand why Python programming is awesome
Learn what sets are and how to use them
Understand common set methods and when to use them
Master when to use sets versus lists
Understand how to iterate through a set
Learn what dictionaries are and how to use them
Master when to use dictionaries versus lists or sets
Understand what a key in a dictionary is
Learn how to iterate over a dictionary
Master what a lambda function is
Learn what the map, reduce, and filter functions do
Understand C functions to manipulate Python objects
prerequisites: Basic control flow structures in Python
Function definition and usage in Python
